thread.title: IDBI Bank signs refinance agreement with Mudra Bank for PMMY
thread.title_full: IDBI Bank signs refinance agreement with Mudra Bank for PMMY

title: IDBI Bank signs refinance agreement with Mudra Bank for PMMY
text: IDBI Bank signs refinance agreement with Mudra Bank for PMMY By PTI | 7 Jul, 2015, 03.25PM IST ET SPECIAL: Love visual aspect of news? Enjoy this exclusive slideshows treat! MUMBAI: State-run IDBI Bank today said it has signed an agreement with Mudra Bank for refinancing of loans given to small enterprises. "As per the agreement, the Bank will offer credit facilities up to Rs 10 lakh to micro enterprises, at a competitive interest rate under Pradhan Mantri Mudra Yojana ( PMMY ) and Mudra will be providing refinance assistance to the bank for eligible sanctioned loan cases," IDBI Bank said in a release. The refinance scheme will be implemented through all the branches of the lender. The agreement was signed on July 1 by IDBI Bank Executive Director S K V Srinivasan and Mudra Bank CEO Jiji Mammen. Last week, Bank of Maharashtra had also signed an agreement with Mudra Bank for refinancing of loans given to new entrepreneurs and small businesses.
